summary: Successfully tested Edit functionality for Farmer and Customer detail pages. All 10 backend tests passed (100%). Frontend UI verified - both Edit buttons visible, edit dialogs open correctly with pre-filled data, and all form fields accessible.
passed_tests: PUT /api/farmers/{farmer_id} - creates farmer, updates all fields, verifies via GET
PUT /api/farmers/{farmer_id} - partial update preserves unchanged fields
PUT /api/customers/{customer_id} - creates customer, updates all fields, verifies via GET
PUT /api/customers/{customer_id} - partial update preserves unchanged fields
PUT /api/customers/{customer_id} - customer type change retail->wholesale works
UI: Farmer detail page Edit button (data-testid='edit-farmer-btn') visible and clickable
UI: Farmer edit dialog opens with pre-filled fields (name, phone, village, address, milk type, fixed rate, bank details)
UI: Farmer edit dialog has all required inputs and submit button
UI: Customer detail page Edit button (data-testid='edit-customer-btn') visible and clickable
UI: Customer edit dialog opens with pre-filled fields (name, phone, address, type, GST)
UI: Customer edit dialog has type toggle (retail/wholesale) and GST field
updated_files: /app/backend/tests/test_edit_endpoints.py - New test file for PUT farmer/customer endpoints
seed_data_creation: Test farmers and customers created and cleaned up during pytest runs
context_for_next_testing_agent: Edit functionality fully working: 1) Farmer detail page at /farmers/{id} has Edit button that opens dialog with name, phone, village, address, milk type (cow/buffalo/mix), fixed rate, bank account, IFSC code, and aadhar number. 2) Customer detail page at /customers/{id} has Edit button that opens dialog with name, phone, address, type toggle (retail/wholesale), and GST number. 3) Both PUT endpoints work correctly with partial updates. 4) App uses Hindi as default language but has English toggle.
